nodes.text: Unite was a Galactic Republic propaganda poster created by the artist Byno Doubton on behalf of the Commission for the Protection of the Republic during the Clone Wars. It depicted a trio of armed Phase I clone troopers against a red banner bearing the Republic crest.

This illustration was created by Star Wars artist Joe Corroney. It was originally created for a set of Star Wars propaganda posters back in 2010, before appearing in the book Star Wars Propaganda: A History of Persuasive Art in the Galaxy six years later.
